Translations.Text: Arau raatira ekansata te'omra prati chajadaranata horaa arau raatira dirgha samaya te'omra paraitrata ghosana arau tachabiha patha karaa
Niscaya sihamta prthiraira jiranaka bhala paya arau sihamte sihamtara sanmukhara kathina dinatoka upeksa karae
Amiye'i sihamtaka srsti karaicho arau sihamtara gathana sudrrha karaicho. Arau ami yetiya iccha karaima tetiya'i sihamtara sthanata sihamtara darae (karaobaka) ani paraibartana karai dima
Niscaya e'ito eta upadesa; eteke yiye iccha karae si yena tara pratipalakara phale yoraara patha bachi laya
Arau allahe iccha nakaraile tomaloke iccha karaibalai saksama naha’ba; niscaya allaha mahajnani, prajnamaya
Te'om yaka iccha take'i nija rahamatara antarbhukta karae, arau yalimasakalara babe te'om prastuta karai raakhiche yantranadayaka sasti
Sapata kalyanasbaraupa praeraita batahara
tara pichata pracanda begata prabahita dhumuhara
sapata pracanda sancalanakaraira
tara pichata suspastaraupe parthakyakaraira
Tara pichata sihamtara, yisakale manuhara antarata upadesa paumca'i diye
ojara-apatti duraikarana arau satarka karaara babe
niscaya tomalokaka yi pratisrauti diya haiche seya arasye sanghatita ha’ba
Yetiya naksatraraaji alohina ha’ba
arau yetiya akasakhana bidirna karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya parbatasamuhaka curnabicurna karaa ha’ba
arau yetiya raachulasakalaka nirdharaita samayata upasthita karaa ha’ba
konato dinara babe e'ibora sthagita rakha haiche
bicara dinara babe
Arau kihe tomaka janaba bicara dirasa ki
se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Ami purbarartisakalaka dhbansa karaa na'ine
tara pichata parabartisakalako sihamtara anugami banama
Aparaadhibilakara lagata ami enekuraa acarane'i karao
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
